intent_atoms.description: The system must always have a completed D2 moof/mfhd sequence number parser before proceeding to D3 parsing tasks.
Implement D3 parsing and validation for traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun, establishing sample table scaffolding for fragment runs.
The D3 parsing implementation must validate the specified fields and ensure that the sample table scaffolding is correctly established.
Real‑world fixtures for Dolby Vision, AV1… must be acquired before synthetic payloads can be replaced and snapshot baselines refreshed.

functional_units.name: moof/mfhd sequence number parser
functional_units.description: Parses the sequence number from the moof/mfhd box in MP4 fragments

functional_units.name: traf/tfhd/tfdt/trun parsing and validation
functional_units.description: Parses and validates traf, tfhd, tfdt, and trun boxes to establish sample table scaffolding for fragment runs
